  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    BoardSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the board
    BookshelfSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the bookshelf
    ChatSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the chat service
    GameStateSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of game state
    GameSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the Game
    ListenerSubscriber
    a listener observer is a class that observe a listener in order to receive a status update by a certain class listened
    PlayerSubscriber
    the interface that provides the method to be implemented by an observer of the Player
    RemoteCommonGoalCard
    This interface specifies the methods exposed by a CommonGoalCard either over RMI or TCP
    RemoteGameController
    This interface represents the methods exposed by the GameController over RMI
    RemoteLobbyController
    This interface represents the methods exposed by the LobbyController over RMI
    RemotePersonalGoalCard
    This interface specifies the methods exposed by a PersonalGoalCard either over RMI or TCP
